trends: There have been 21 other sightings in Springfield
There were no other sightings in Springfield on or around September 19th 2009
divs: Sighting DetailsThe light was a small light with a broad beam with a mist in the light. The light stayed about a minute then just kind of faded. The misty light lingered after the main light disapeared. I have seen ufo's before but this was nothing like I have ever seen. This is a populated area. I was on my deck and it is a very clear night. I thought it might be a helecopter at first,but no way. I was stuned at what I was seeimg and a little freaked out. I tried to go get my wife but I did not have enough time. I will be thinking about this for some time.
Summary: BROAD BEAM OF LIGHT OUT OF SKY WITH A LIGHT MIST IN THE LIGHT.
